description: Try our easy to follow French Onion Beef Stew recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: French Onion Beef Stew Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat grill on high. Arrange baguette slices over beef mixture. Scatter over cheese. Grill for 5 minutes or until golden. Scatter over extra thyme and serve.
